headline.main: Factbox: Trump's Early Executive Actions Could Undo Obama Policies
headline.print_headline: Factbox: Trump's Early Executive Actions Could Undo Obama Policies

docs.lead_paragraph: Republican President-elect Donald Trump is expected to take executive action shortly after being sworn into office on Friday to advance key priorities and reverse some policies of outgoing Democratic President Barack Obama.
docs.snippet: Republican President-elect Donald Trump is expected to take executive action shortly after being sworn into office on Friday to advance key priorities and reverse some policies of outgoing Democratic President Barack Obama....

headline.main: Obama Criticizes Congress for Refusing to Close Cuba Prison
headline.print_headline: Obama Criticizes Congress for Refusing to Close Cuba Prison

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama on Thursday blamed Congress for his failure to keep a promise to close the military prison at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, saying there's "simply no justification beyond politics" to keep it open.
docs.snippet: President Barack Obama on Thursday blamed Congress for his failure to keep a promise to close the military prison at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, saying there's "simply no justification beyond politics" to keep it open....

headline.main: Bruce Springsteen Gives Farewell Concert for Obama Staffers
headline.print_headline: Bruce Springsteen Gives Farewell Concert for Obama Staffers

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama's farewell gift to some of his longtime staffers was a private concert from "The Boss."

headline.main: In Bipartisan Nod, GOP-Led Mississippi Senate Commends Obama
headline.print_headline: In Bipartisan Nod, GOP-Led Mississippi Senate Commends Obama

docs.lead_paragraph: The Republican-led Mississippi Legislature has resisted much of President Barack Obama's agenda, but in an apparent bipartisan gesture of goodwill, the state Senate adopted a resolution Thursday calling the Democrat "one of the most consequential presidents in recent history."

headline.main: 'I've Seen Rain:' James Taylor Bemoans End of Obama Era
headline.print_headline: 'I've Seen Rain:' James Taylor Bemoans End of Obama Era

docs.lead_paragraph: Half a world away from Washington, James Taylor is greeting fans with a video bemoaning the end of the Obama era.

headline.main: Obama Suggests U.S. Embassy Move to Jerusalem Could Be 'Explosive'
headline.print_headline: Obama Suggests U.S. Embassy Move to Jerusalem Could Be 'Explosive'

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama suggested on Wednesday that moving the  U.S. embassy to Jerusalem could have "explosive" results and said he was worried that the prospects for a two-state solution to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict were waning.

headline.main: Senators Reach Deal on Stimulus Plan as Jobs Vanish
headline.print_headline: As Jobs Vanish, Senators Reach Deal on Stimulus: PARED-DOWN BILL

byline.original: By CARL HULSE  and DAVID M. HERSZENHORN

docs.lead_paragraph: Senate Democrats reached an agreement with Republican moderates to pare the huge bill after two days of tense negotiations.
docs.snippet: Senate Democrats reached an agreement with Republican moderates to pare the huge bill after two days of tense negotiations....

headline.sub: President Urges Swift Action After Bleak Jobs Report

docs.lead_paragraph: CNBC coverage of a press conference with President Obama, in which he urged swift Congressional action on a stimulus bill and announced the creation of an economic advisory board, headed Paul Volcker, former chairman of the Federal Reserve.
